subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to comment test methods in Junit 4?
msgSnippet: ... Since you downloaded the Javadoc, could you shed some light on the goal of the Request class? Also, I m not quite sure I understand why I need to create a
messageBody:
On 6/7/06, Ilja Preuss <preuss@...> wrote:
>
>
> Well
>
> Request filtered= request.filterWith(filter);
>
> seems to suggest that there is more than one way to define a Request.
>
> OK, I downloaded the javadoc (it's not online, unfortunately?), and there
> is
> also a method to define a Request for a set of test classes, as well as
> for
> a single test method.


Since you downloaded the Javadoc, could you shed some light on the goal of
the Request class?

Also, I'm not quite sure I understand why I need to create a Request first
whenever I need a filter...

--
Cédric
